remarks: If ` F ` is a complex continuous function and N is a fixed number, then F^N is continuous too.  A generalization of ~ expcncf .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)

expcnfg.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
expcnfg $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) ^ N ) ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d N x $.
$d ph x $.
